Class DayCounterData

java.lang.Object
  dca.com.DayCounter
      dca.com.DayCounterData

public class DayCounterData
extends DayCounter

DayCounterData Class extends DayCounter This subclass handles any data requests for its superclass, combining method calls used together into various calling methods.

2011.0711

checkMonth

public int checkMonth(int month,
                      int year)
This method will return the number of days in any given month. Functionally identical to the other method, only this uses an integer to represent the month.

Parameters:
month - - the month number
year - - the year.
Returns:
ans - the number of days in that month.
